name: PasswordPusher
description: An application to communicate sensitive information over the web. Secret links expire after a certain number of views and/or time has passed. Supports passwords, files, URLs, and QR codes with full audit logging.

PWPUSH_MASTER_KEY.description: Application Encryption Key - Required for encrypting sensitive data. Generate with: rails runner 'puts Lockbox.generate_key'

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: Rails secret key base for session encryption. Generate with: rails secret

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of Puma processes to run

PWP__PW__EXPIRE_AFTER_DAYS_DEFAULT.description: Default value for password push expiration (days)

PWP__PW__EXPIRE_AFTER_DAYS_MIN.description: Minimum value for password push expiration (days)

PWP__PW__EXPIRE_AFTER_DAYS_MAX.description: Maximum value for password push expiration (days)

PWP__PW__EXPIRE_AFTER_VIEWS_DEFAULT.description: Default value for password push expiration (views)

PWP__PW__EXPIRE_AFTER_VIEWS_MIN.description: Minimum value for password push expiration (views)

PWP__PW__EXPIRE_AFTER_VIEWS_MAX.description: Maximum value for password push expiration (views)

PWP__PW__ENABLE_DELETABLE_PUSHES.description: Enable the ability for viewers to delete password pushes before expiration

PWP__PW__DELETABLE_PUSHES_DEFAULT.description: Default value for deletable pushes checkbox and JSON API

PWP__PW__ENABLE_RETRIEVAL_STEP.description: Enable the 1-click retrieval step feature for password pushes

PWP__PW__RETRIEVAL_STEP_DEFAULT.description: Default value for the 1-click retrieval step option

PWP__ENABLE_LOGINS.description: Enable user account logins (requires SMTP configuration)

PWP__ENABLE_FILE_PUSHES.description: Enable file upload pushes (requires logins and storage configuration)

PWP__HOST_DOMAIN.description: The domain where this instance is hosted (without protocol)

PWP__HOST_PROTOCOL.description: The protocol to reach the domain (http or https)

PWP__THEME.description: Bootswatch theme name (e.g., default, darkly, flatly, cosmo). See https://docs.pwpush.com/docs/themes/
